name: Warrior Bob 2
description: Warrior Bob 2 takes you through the depths of hell as a lowly god hunter who is on the hunt for the twin gods of hell. In order to succeed you must over come deadly terrain, relentless lava imps, and deadly bosses. Armed with nothing more than a ranged sword, and insane jumping skills, you must, against all odds, kill both gods of hell. Warrior Bob 2 features the unforgiving terrain of hell, tumultuous ambience, terrifying platforming, and relentless enemies. Warrior Bob 2 is, simply put, the most unforgiving, challenging, and addictive, first person indie platforming hack 'n' slash game ever created.
